header_text: Your significant other's parents have invited you to join them for the holidays. You are excited to spend time with your partner's family, but you worry your own parents will be disappointed that you are not with them. When you think about telling your parents you would like to spend the holidays with your partner, you believe that they will be empathetic.

elements.text: Your significant other's children have invited you to join them for the holidays. You are excited to spend time with your partner's family, but you worry your own children will be disappointed that you are not with them. When you think about telling your children you would like to spend the holidays with your partner, you believe that they will be...
